refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The inverse operator produces the matrix inverse of a square matrix. The input matrix must be invertible, that is, the determinant of the matrix must be non-zero. If the determinant is zero, SciDB returns an error.

informalexample.para: This example find the matrix inverse of a 3Ã—3 matrix.

step.para: Create a matrix m3x3:--afl CREATE ARRAY m3x3 <val:double>[i=0:2,3,0,j=0:2,3,0]; --show-output=no
Put values of 1 and 2 into m3x3 to represent a nonsingular matrix:--afl store(build(m3x3,iif(i=j,1,2)),m3x3); --output-format=dense --chunkify=yes
